content: **the latest version is hachi_v4** v4-23/09/20 corrected spelling of german short row v3-02/07/20 corrected the first sentence in sec 3 v2-06/03/20 corrected sr9 of sec 3 **hachi** has cable lines that look like the kanji 八 it is first worked in the round then back and forth separately to the underarm they are joined again and worked in the round each sleeve is picked up from each side of the body **yarn** daruma geek 50g / 115m / 56% wool 30% polyester 14% alpaca color no 4 black and blue approximately 270g / 630m **needles** 6 0mm/jp13 circular needle 5 1mm/jp10 circular needle **gauge** 14sts and 20 5rows = 10cm in stockinette stitch with 6 0mm/jp13 needle **size** one size finished body circumference approximately 126cm **technique** german short row
